altername_name: Nakajima Satoru Kanshuu: F-1 Hero MD
Nakajima Satoru Kanshū: F-1 Hero MD
name: Ferrari Grand Prix Challenge
overview: It's the ultimate driving competition... the FERRARI GRAND PRIX CHALLENGE. Head-to-head, 2-player "real-time" split-screen action separates Ferrari from the rest of the pack. Choose your team and drivers. Select the weather and road conditions. Customize your car with engine, tire, brakes and manual or automatic transmission. Tune your suspension for the fastest handling. Now you're ready to compete on over 16 tracks across 6 continents at record-breaking speeds! FERRARI GRAND PRIX CHALLENGE... closer to F1 racing than anything you've ever played!
